Aaaaah, Reloaded. Hahaha, you crack me up bro, is there ANYTHING you can't do related to games and cracking?... Ur inspirational, lol!

People, stop asking stupid questions. The instructions are oh so simple... 
1.Open up what you downloaded, 
2.don't worry bout the update just yet.
3. TURN OFF YOUR INTERNET!! For the love of all thats holly, just turn it off, lol.
4. Open avatar.exe, NOT AVATARLAUNCHER.EXE. From your avatar/bin folder
5. WHEN YOU'RE OFFLINE... Let it do its thing and it'll give you a Hardware ID.
6. Copy the hardware ID into the keygen and click generate.
7. copy the that key from the keygen into the avatar thingy majig and click submit /next (or something like that).
8. Enjoy  :-D
